scripts.install: cd ../marketplace_client && npm install && cd - && cd ../marketplace_rendezvous && npm install && cd -
scripts.clean: rm -rf ./dist/*/server-* ./build ./browser/*.js && cd ../marketplace_client && npm run clean && cd -
scripts.postinstall: npm run clean && npm run set_dev && ./scripts/postinstall.sh && cd ../marketplace_client && ./scripts/postinstall.sh && cd -
scripts.jsbin: ps -fewwww | grep jsbin | awk '{ print $2 }' | xargs kill -TERM; echo 'starting jsbin on http://localhost:3000'; jsbin &> /dev/null &
scripts.build: npm run libp2p-bundle && NODE_ENV=development LOGGY_STACKS=1 ./node_modules/.bin/brunch w
scripts.dev: ./node_modules/.bin/concurrently --success last --names 'RNDZ,BUILD,SRV,BOB,TOM,JAMES,CL-1,ALICE' --prefix '{time}-{name}' -t HH:mm:ss --prefix-colors cyan,magenta,yellow,blue,white,gray,green,red 'npm run rendezvous' 'npm run build' 'npm run server' 'npm run bob' 'npm run tom' 'npm run james' 'npm run cl-1' 'npm run alice'
scripts.backup: F=$npm_package_name$(date +%y%m%d-%H%M).tbz; npm run clean; tar cvfjh ../$F . --exclude=./node_modules --exclude=./marketplace_client/node_modules --exclude=./marketplace_rendezvous/node_modules --exclude=./build --exclude=./marketplace_client/build --exclude=./.git --exclude=./marketplace_client/.git --exclude=./marketplace_rendezvous/.git --exclude=./marketplace_client/dist/*/store_* --exclude=./marketplace_client/dist/*/*/blockchain; echo 'ready: ../'$F
scripts.release: npm run clean && npm run set_prod && ./node_modules/.bin/brunch b && ./node_modules/.bin/brunch b && npm run libp2p-bundle && ./scripts/release.sh && if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then echo 'failed!!!'; exit 9; fi; echo 'server released'; cd ./marketplace_client; ./scripts/release.sh; if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then echo 'failed!!!'; exit 9; fi; cd -
